content.rendered:
Ree & Partners;

(Independent International Banking & Financial Consultant, Entrepreneur/Deal-maker.)

Strict Principles, Rules & Regulation

Ree & Partners; (MOU/NDA/NCND) After Our Face to Face Meeting with the Main Buyer/Clients/Customers. We will draft the comprehensive (MOU) Memorandum of Understanding & (NDA) Non-Disclosure Agreement. Affidavit & Oath. And a detail proposal as to. What will be our individual responsibilities? forcomplete the entire transactions /projects, which details of an arrangements agreeable to both of us/both party, could be discuss in details all the relevant banking compliance, statutory & regulatory, BG/SBLC/L/Cs providers, banking & financial requirements, documentations, terms & conditions, time period, procedures, all the relevant questions and answers in the meeting and finalized the MOU/NDA/NCND Affidavit & Oath, and this comprehensive proposal should protect, safe and secure our mutual business benefits & financial interests. Effectively and efficiently. Legal experts will be review the, Contract/Agreement, MOU/NDA NCND, Affidavit & Oath. And after legal opinion and advice both party will be finalized the MOU/NDA/NCND, Affidavit & Oath and MOU/NDA/NCND, Affidavit & Oath, will be sign on legal stamp papers. Which please Note…!

PLEASE NOTE: (We work with the principles only with strict rules & regulation).

Ree & Partners; Engage Letter/MOU/NDA. You will be required to provide proof of funds BEFORE we release references and other Confidential information. If you wish to arrange a personal meeting with one of our Board of Directors or Board of Trustees or Supreme Board of Governing Council Members, you will be required to provide proof of funds BEFORE any meetings will take place. Our time and expertise are very valuable, and we do NOT entertain customers who cannot prove their financial standing to conclude such Business & Huge Financial transactions.!

Ree & Partners; We work with PRINCIPLES only, anywhere across the world, to protect our clients and to protect our all-inclusive price structures, we do NOT accept brokers, agents, lawyers, chartered accountants or other intermediaries, who want to Markup our prices and ask us to freely “Educate them" about our banking business expertise and knowledge. Our clients CONFIDENTIALITY is paramount…!

Ree & Partners; Our Executive Professional Team Members have broad and deep expertise in banking & finance, investment, wealth asset planning, international banking, business and carefully structuring individuals and commercial wealth globally. We do not profess to know all the solutions but we certainly can give you more keys to more doors than most. We offer a range of different Consultations to assist clients, can discover core purpose and make it a reality to plan and execute the best strategies to help them complete safely and effectively achieve their long term most important Goals, Objects, Aims & Ambitious.

Ree & Partners Mission: One Team & One Goal!

Our mission is to offer insights that spark great conversations that make things happen. We can add value because we bring the perspective of our work as entrepreneurs, bankers, senior executives, technologists, investors and consultants. It is pure fact based on solid practical evidence.

Ree & Partners; Is Complete Offshore Firm. Independent International Banking & Financial Consultant, Entrepreneur/Deal-maker.

Ree & Partners; Our Executive Professional Team Members have broad and deep expertise in banking & finance, investment, wealth asset planning, international banking, business and carefully structuring individuals and commercial wealth globally. We do not profess to know all the solutions but we certainly can give you more keys to more doors than most. We offer a range of different Consultations to assist clients, can discover core purpose and make it a reality to plan and execute the best strategies to help them complete safely and effectively achieve their long term most important Goals, Objects, Aims & Ambitious.
